message: Let's split it 60-40. It's a fair start.

I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still want a slight edge. Meet me in the middle, but slightly tilted towards me.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still want to be closer to the original 50-50 split. This is my final offer.
